channel.title: Coordinates messed up!
channel.description:
I put in these coordinates in public boolean nonWild() {
[code](absX >=3089 && absX <=3919 && absY >=3119 && absY <=3947 )||[/code]
they are the coordinates of the mage arena.
when i go to the mage arena and att somone, it doesnt att them.(thats good)
then when i go out of the east bank i cant att anyone? wtf? did i mess up the coordinates or somthing. plz help. thanks

item.title: Coordinates messed up!
item.dc:creator: @SWAT SWAT
item.description:
@SWAT wrote:

| (absX >= 2495 && absX <= 2520 && absY >=4680 && absY <=4730 ) | = mb At staffs

| (absX >= 2527 && absX <= 2549 && absY >=4708 && absY <=4724 ) | = mb at lever

| (absX >= 3092 && absX <= 3119 && absY >=3945 && absY <=3918) | = platform only

this are safezones ---------------------------------------------------------------

(absX >=3089 && absX <=3919 && absY >=3119 && absY <=3947 )||

                                needs to be

(absX >=3089 && absX <=3119 && absY >=3919 && absY <=3947 )||

Read full topic

item.title: Coordinates messed up!
item.dc:creator: @sitebanis sitebanis
item.description:
@sitebanis wrote:

yes
but look at this:

^ ^ ^ ^

do i put first x coord. in the first spot. and the 2nd x coord. in the 2nd spot or do i put the first x coord. in the first spot and the first y coord. in the second spot?

this really confusing
